languages.text: "Ваше рвение похвально, однако, как вы понимаете, любое процессуальное действо требует предварительной регистрации — а это ряд процедур по заполнению и подписанию регламентированных документов. По этой причине я, к сожалению, не в силах удовлетворить вашу просьбу. С вашего дозволения, теперь я вернусь к исполнению своих обязанностей. Благодарю".

traits.locale_text: "Ваше рвение похвально, однако, как вы понимаете, любое процессуальное действо требует предварительной регистрации — а это ряд процедур по заполнению и подписанию регламентированных документов. По этой причине я, к сожалению, не в силах удовлетворить вашу просьбу. С вашего дозволения, теперь я вернусь к исполнению своих обязанностей. Благодарю".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."
languages.original_text: "Ваше рвение похвально, однако, как вы понимаете, любое процессуальное действо требует предварительной регистрации — а это ряд процедур по заполнению и подписанию регламентированных документов. По этой причине я, к сожалению, не в силах удовлетворить вашу просьбу. С вашего дозволения, теперь я вернусь к исполнению своих обязанностей. Благодарю".

traits.locale_text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

"Unfortunately, the rest of the cases require a more ponderate and exacting judge. Besides, you would find them too boring, Rogue Trader. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

"Unfortunately, all the remaining cases require a more ponderate and exacting judge. Besides, you would find them far too boring, Rogue Trader. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

"Unfortunately, all the remaining cases require a more ponderate and exacting judge. Besides, you would find them far too boring, Rogue Trader. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

"Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

languages.text: "Euer Enthusiasmus ist lobenswert, aber wie Ihr gewiss verstehen werdet, bedarf jedes Prozedere einer vorherigen Registrierung ... die wiederum die Einreichung offizieller Formulare und die Unterzeichnung gebilligter Dokumente umfasst. Aus diesem Grund kann ich Eurem Antrag leider nicht stattgeben. Wenn Ihr gestattet, widme ich mich nun wieder meinen Pflichten. Danke."
languages.original_text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Enthusiasmus ist lobenswert, aber wie Ihr gewiss verstehen werdet, bedarf jedes Prozedere einer vorherigen Registrierung ... die wiederum die Einreichung offizieller Formulare und die Unterzeichnung gebilligter Dokumente umfasst. Aus diesem Grund kann ich Eurem Antrag leider nicht stattgeben. Wenn Ihr gestattet, widme ich mich nun wieder meinen Pflichten. Danke."

languages.text: « Votre enthousiasme est louable, mais comme vous le comprenez certainement, toute procédure nécessite un enregistrement préalable, ce qui implique de remplir des formulaires officiels et de signer des documents approuvés par le règlement. C'est pour cette raison que je ne peux, hélas, honorer votre demande. Avec votre permission, je vais maintenant retourner à mes occupations. Je vous remercie. »
languages.original_text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: « Votre enthousiasme est louable, mais comme vous le comprenez certainement, toute procédure nécessite un enregistrement préalable, ce qui implique de remplir des formulaires officiels et de signer des documents approuvés par le règlement. C'est pour cette raison que je ne peux, hélas, honorer votre demande. Avec votre permission, je vais maintenant retourner à mes occupations. Je vous remercie. »

languages.text: “您的热情值得称赞。不过相信您能明白，所有程序都需要事先进行注册，而注册工作涉及到填写官方表格，签署法规批准的文件等等。很遗憾，由于上述原因，我无法答应您的请求。如果您不介意的话，我准备回去工作了，感谢您的协助。”
languages.original_text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: “您的热情值得称赞。不过相信您能明白，所有程序都需要事先进行注册，而注册工作涉及到填写官方表格，签署法规批准的文件等等。很遗憾，由于上述原因，我无法答应您的请求。如果您不介意的话，我准备回去工作了，感谢您的协助。”

languages.text: «Su entusiasmo es admirable, pero, como sin duda comprenderá, cualquier tipo de proceso requiere un registro previo, lo que, a su vez, implica rellenar formularios oficiales y firmar los documentos que dicta la regulación. Por ese motivo, lamentablemente, no puedo aceptar su solicitud. Con su permiso, ahora volveré a mis deberes. Gracias».
languages.original_text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: «Su entusiasmo es admirable, pero, como sin duda comprenderá, cualquier tipo de proceso requiere un registro previo, lo que, a su vez, implica rellenar formularios oficiales y firmar los documentos que dicta la regulación. Por ese motivo, lamentablemente, no puedo aceptar su solicitud. Con su permiso, ahora volveré a mis deberes. Gracias».

languages.text: 「あなたの熱意は称賛に値しますが、ご理解いただけると思いますが、いかなる手続きも事前の登録が必要になります。要するに、公式フォームへの記入と規定承認文書への署名が必要です。こうした理由により、残念ながらあなたのご要望にはお応えできません。申し訳ありませんが、そろそろ職務に戻らせていただきます。それでは失礼いたします」
languages.original_text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの熱意は称賛に値しますが、ご理解いただけると思いますが、いかなる手続きも事前の登録が必要になります。要するに、公式フォームへの記入と規定承認文書への署名が必要です。こうした理由により、残念ながらあなたのご要望にはお応えできません。申し訳ありませんが、そろそろ職務に戻らせていただきます。それでは失礼いたします」

languages.text: "Hevesiniz takdire şayan ancak sizin de anlayacağınız üzere bu prosedür, önceden kayıt yaptırılmasını gerektiriyor. Bu da resmî formların doldurulması ve yönetmelik onaylı belgelerin imzalanması anlamına geliyor. Bu nedenle ne yazık ki talebinizi gerçekleştiremem. İzninizle şimdi görevimin başına dönüyorum. Teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "Your enthusiasm is laudable, but, as I'm sure you understand, any manner of procedure requires prior registration — which, in turn, involves filling out official forms and signing regulation-approved documents. It is for this reason that I am, alas, unable to honour your request. With your permission, I will now return to my duties. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: "Hevesiniz takdire şayan ancak sizin de anlayacağınız üzere bu prosedür, önceden kayıt yaptırılmasını gerektiriyor. Bu da resmî formların doldurulması ve yönetmelik onaylı belgelerin imzalanması anlamına geliyor. Bu nedenle ne yazık ki talebinizi gerçekleştiremem. İzninizle şimdi görevimin başına dönüyorum. Teşekkür ederim."
